<title
    level="1"
    right="Feat 6"
    pfs="Limited"
>
[Axe Thrower](/Feats.aspx?ID=1235) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Archetype" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=12" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #153: Life's Long Shadows](/Sources.aspx?ID=29) pg. 75</row>

**Archetype** [Turpin Rowe Lumberjack](/Archetypes.aspx?ID=40)

**Prerequisites**
[Turpin Rowe Lumberjack Dedication](/Feats.aspx?ID=1232)

</column>

---

You have mastered the weight and balance of a variety of axes and can lob them with ease. Any one-handed axe weapon you wield has the [thrown](/Traits.aspx?ID=195) trait with a range of 10 feet. For axes that already have the thrown trait, the range increases by 10 feet. When you critically succeed at an attack roll with a thrown axe weapon, you apply the axe’s critical specialization effect.
name: Axe Thrower
